title: Update welcome screen intro subtitle copy

requirements.text:
Update the subtitle/intro text displayed directly under the "Welcome to MyGallery" heading on the unauthenticated welcome screen (frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScreen.tsx) to exactly this English copy (preserve the two sentences):

"This is your personal space for organization and self-improvement.
Create missions, break them into tasks, and complete them step by step."

quotes:
Το κείμενο intro κάτω από το welcome to my gallery να γίνει :στα αγγλικά This is your personal space for organization and self-improvement.

acceptanceCriteria: When logged out, the welcome screen shows the heading "Welcome to MyGallery" and the subtitle text exactly matches the provided English copy (including sentence text and line break/paragraph split).
No other user-facing text is changed.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text changed as part of this request.
Do not modify files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Do not change the post-login IntroScreen animation or timing.
Do not add or modify missions functionality; only update the welcome screen subtitle copy.
